title: WTT: Lower grade T207's including O. Miller and Lange
author: Archive

posts.post_title: WTT: Lower grade T207's including O. Miller and Lange
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Marc Del Percio
Hello. I have the following lower grade T207's available to trade. I am looking for other T207's or e90-1 in return. Please e-mail with any offers. Thanks for looking. 

Cole - light crease and maybe trimmed on top edge 

Doyle - crease and glue residue on edge and back 

Hamilton - light creasing, nice looking overall 

Lange - creasing - VERY tough card with Anonymous back

Latham - crease and spot of paper loss on front, residue on back 

McBride - very nice looking overall but possibly trimmed

Otto Miller - creasing and rounded corners - VERY tough card, Broadleaf back 

O'Toole - creasing and pencil mark on top edge 

[IMG]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u313/marcdelpercio/t207lot001-2.jpg[/IMG]

posts.post_title: WTT: Lower grade T207's including O. Miller and Lange
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Marc Del Percio
Added Otto Miller and Bill Lange.  Two very tough cards.  Lange has the Anonymous Factory 25 back which makes it even scarcer.  I'm looking to trade for other T207's that I need.
